title: Etekcity VGA to 1080p HDMI Scaling Converter
description: If you need to convert any VGA signal into a digital high definition HDMI signal up to 1080p resolution, the conversion box will do the job perfectly. The Etekcity VGA to HDMI converter is designed to take video and audio signal from PC or Laptop and upscale it to digital HDMI output of wide-range HDTV and PC resolutions, up to 1080p. Plug and play, don't need other software.Great for connecting the VGA video output of your computer or media  server and integrating it into a new digital HDMI Home Theater System.We've tested the Etekcity VGA to HDMI Converter and it works really  well. We take VGA to HDMI quite seriously, having tested many units over  the last year or so. This unit has the best value on the market,  converting up to 1080p perfectly without any bands of color, artifacts,  or blips that other modestly priced VGA to HDMI scalers can sometimes  have.Great for connecting the VGA video output of your computer or media server and integrating it into a new digital HDMI Home Theater System.  We've tested the Etekcity VGA to HDMI Converter and it works really well. We take VGA to HDMI quite seriously, having tested many units over the last year or so. This unit has the best value on the market, converting up to 1080p perfectly without any bands of color, artifacts, or blips that other modestly priced VGA to HDMI scalers can sometimes have.Features:1.Up-scales VGA to HDMI 720P or 1080P2.Auto-store setting of output resolution3.Supports VGA Input: 640x480@60/75Hz, 800x600@60/75Hz, 1024x768@60Hz, 1280x720@60Hz, 1280x800@60Hz, 1280x960@60Hz, 1360x768@60Hz, 1440x900@60Hz, 1400x1050@60Hz, 1680x1050@60Hz, 1920x1080@60Hz. ( Recommended input resolution: 1024x768@60Hz )4.Supports HDMI Output: 720P/60Hz, 1080P/60Hz5.Product Dimension: 119 x 74 x 23 mm 6.Interface: VGA input, HDMI output, 3.5mm Audio input, DC5V Power inputPackage Content： Etekcity VGA to HDMI 1080P Scale converter/adapter Manual Power supply
